website_summaries.verdict: This is a good pull-up bar for anyone who wants a bar that can be stowed away after use.
pros: Two sets of wall mounts and a locking bar
The foam hand grips provide comfort and stability, and the bar does not rotate or slip as it does with some models
The bar extends by twisting for a secure lock
cons: A solid doorframe is needed or the bar will damage the frame

customer_reviews.title: great pull up bar
customer_reviews.text: great pull up bar. exactly what I needed. I was going to order another one but for some reason it no longer ships to Canada. its probably because of the new policies in place. anyway, great product. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Karl S.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims.
customer_reviews.text: It flexes and feels kinda weak but is the one the I could find that is adjustable to 48". I have it adjusted to the widest adjustment and is holding me up so as long as its doing its job, Ill keep it.
customer_reviews.author: familyman

customer_reviews.title: Really SOLID Bar
customer_reviews.text: The bar is is really high quality. Installing it was a breeze and using it is fun. It feels really stable and foam grips are good looking AND super functional. I have had it for just a couple of weeks but feel confident enough to say that this bar is going to last a long time. Some numbers for those who may need them..I am using it on a 43 inch wide door and I weigh 152 pounds. Looking at the heavy pipes and construction of this bar, I would say it should not have any problem in being installed on broader doors and bearing much heavier weights.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty and WIDE!  I used longer screws for rock solid install!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and wide as described!!! I use this as a pull-up bar and also to anchor my TRX suspension trainer. I’ve installed this between two door frames with a distance of 40-41”. I ended up using 2” screws instead of the ones provided as the drywall didn’t hold on one side (It didn’t reach the wood beam and was loose). The longer screws reached the 2x6 wood beam above the door frame which made it rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: Dare 2 Live

customer_reviews.title: Don't hang without mounts
customer_reviews.text: I installed the it without the mounting bracket in place and it was a big mistake. It held up fine for a few months now but it eventually rotated loose. Reinstalled with the mounting bracket and it's ok now. Not as sturdy as I like. It does flex a little but it's not a big concern. Originally when it first arrived, one of the mount bracket was stuck to one of the ends of the bar. I had to use a hammer to get it out which marred up the bracket. Luckily it came with extra mounts. It does rotate even if I tighten down the two retaining screws super tight. Something to keep in mind. Overall, not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected! The grips are very comfortable. Since we're pretty light in this household, the tiny amount of 'flexion' (if that's what I am feeling) is no problem at all. I think if you're heavier and you were to use the maximum extension, you would notice a little sway, but it feels more than sturdy and strong enough to handle that. Arrived very quickly too, shout-out to seller!
customer_reviews.author: JD LOVE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product & even better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised and is a great quality pull up bar! What made my purchase even better was the incredible customer service Garren provided. There was a little issue with my first order and he was very responsive, eager and willing to help me sort it out. He went above and beyond to ensure I had a good experience. I highly recommend purchasing this item even more so from this seller. Thanks again Garren!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: The sturdy little pull up bar that could...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because the ceiling is too low in my basement for my pull up tower I have, and the doors in my house aren't ideal for an over the door pull up bar. I'm actually glad that they aren't, because I like this better. The Pull Up Bar is very solid, sturdy, and it was easy to assemble. I had to get the PLUS size since the width of the area I placed it was 38". I weigh 165lbs and it holds my weight easily I go through the chin up and pull up motion. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pull-up bar / Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Well made and heavy duty. I like that it comes with 3 pairs of metal attachments that secure it to the wall. It allows me to secure the bar at different heights very easily. Place the securing attachments to the desired heights and with an easy twisting of the bar you can place the bar high, middle, or low to do different exercises. I’m glad I went with Maximiza Plus.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Aerialist friendly
customer_reviews.text: So, I’m an aerialist and bought this for conditioning at home. I can not only do pull-ups, no problem. I can mount and do sit-ups, or hang different ways and it holds me, without any issues. I mean, I’m not that heavy so it’s not because it’s so sturdy but 135-140 lbs, it handles like a champ. It does spin a little but just adjust it often. Sadly, I’ve had to put 4 holes on each side of my doorframe. I will be adding to that and hanging a hammock from it. Will update if unsuccessful but it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality, great customer service, IMPORTANT TIP!
customer_reviews.text: So when I got it, I thought it was defective, b/c I could turn one end easily, counter-clockwise, but the other end wouldn't budge. This is b/c one end turns counter-clockwise, and the other end must turn CLOCKWISE. After you get both ends even, you can place it in the brackets, and then turn the middle, padded part of the bar away from you until it tightens. Don't overtighten. Then, to prevent the bar from spinning, use the Allen wrench included in the set to tighten the screws that sit on each end of the middle bar. Regan answered my questions very promptly and helped me figure out the issue. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This bar is pretty sturdy. I bought to learn how to do more pullups. My kid can hang upside down (I do not recommend) and it is still holding strong. The installation was only a little complicated because the pieces that you have to screw into the wall, were already attached to the bar and difficult to get off for some reason. For a second, I was starting to think they didn't come off... instructions weren't clear. Otherwise, it was pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: Kay W

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and over engineered!
customer_reviews.text: Took no more than five minutes to take it out of the box, adjust according to the width of my stairwell and install. Very sturdy that I even step on it , when I was painting the wall on top of the bar. Excellent product and well made. I wished that it comes in black color to match my decor.
customer_reviews.author: AHawck

customer_reviews.title: Great bar
customer_reviews.text: If you just need a bar for chin ups this will do the trick. We put it between two trees at our summer place and there was two extra sets to hold the bars so se can mount it at our regular home too. Just take the bar and travel. It was perfect for my son.
customer_reviews.author: GailMRogers

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few months and its held up without issue. The mounting hardware is strong and comes with an extra set so you can move the center post around to two different locations if needed. Installing it on strong studs is probably the biggest factor in how this thing will function. I'd buy it again if I feel into a time travel wormhole.
customer_reviews.author: Digitalmayor

customer_reviews.title: Best pull-up bar for home gym
customer_reviews.text: Great company. Perfect for the home gym. Ordered this one for wide door frame. Wish there was a way for me to upload pictures. Looks amazing. Sturdy, mounts to wall do no slipping. Also presses against wall for added support.
customer_reviews.author: Kingsman

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide doorways
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an unobtrusive pull-up bar that had to fit into a wide doorway. The Garren bar was good, but not great. Positive: Easy to install, fits well, relatively sturdy when centered. Areas of improvement: The foam on the bar is OK but I don't like the ridges, would prefer a flat bar. Also the adjustment screws stick out a little too much so it's not comfortable to hold there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well padded and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it came with three sets of heavy duty support rings. We have them set at various levels for the different exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Best Life

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Minus one star for the included screws being too short. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hochuli

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, and Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a longer bar to install in my hallway. This bar was perfect. I was missing a small part. I'm not sure if it arrived missing or if I lost it, but I contacted the vendor. They sent me a whole box of extra parts ASAP for free. The installation was easy, and it's more than secure enough to hold up a grown mans weight. I would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: family

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Great to stretch the shoulders and thoracic spine. Very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Deslauriers

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Steady
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and his cousin. We mounted it in the mail hallway of out home. They both are constantly doing pull ups stretches, and all different types of exercises constantly. They were a little skeptic at first, but now they trust that the bar can hold up since it can easily hold up the two of them! We don't use the other mounts however, we only have it set up as a pull up bar.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far. I always wanted one for years and never bought till now. This one seems strong and very well made. Very comfortable for the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This bar supports my 185-lbs frame doing pull ups and other exercises. Additionally, I coupled this with some chains and a gymnastics ring set for my daughter to hang on. I’ve seen multiple children run and swing full force on this thing. The bar did not show any signs of giving out. You may have to replace the foam padding rather soon, as I’ve noticed mine is beginning to split
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Well built, solid
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pull-up bar I have ever bought and I am not disappointed. This came with plenty of hardware to mount in multiple locations if I desired and is solid. It feels safe and does not give at all. The padding is firm but does help with someone who does not have callous hands. I highly recommend this bar.
customer_reviews.author: JimW

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Final Update: Boom goes the dynamite. Very happy with the product. Thanks Garren Fitness. Update: Garren Fitness responded and is doing the right thing to rectify it all. Will update again. Super excited to open my first pull up bar to install. I CAN'T. The mount is sealed on to the bar and cannot be removed. Garren Fitness please respond. Unhappy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Ace White

customer_reviews.title: Great product-- very secure and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for-- I needed a much wider bar to be used between two beams and this fit perfectly. It's extremely secure and gives me great confidence that I even hang upside down from it. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Solid, heavy duty bar for wider doorways
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, easy to un-box, a bunch of brackets (though you only need two for a permanent installation) including screws. The bar is longer than most, as advertised, so it fit well in an alcove in front of a doorway. This allowed it to be mounted higher than the typical doorway models, so there is more headroom ( a big plus). The bar feels very strong and the lock-in-place hex set screws provide even more stability. For the price, I feel it's a good value and a solid choice.
customer_reviews.author: ckano

customer_reviews.title: Tough and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but make sure you check min width before drilling as it was longer than width of closet door frame but that’s on me. If it’s not wood door frame, make sure to use wall anchors. Exceptional product so highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John H, FL

customer_reviews.title: Bar is about 1 1/ 2 inches in diameter.
customer_reviews.text: Great bar. Very well designed and constructed. Need a large wooden opening to attach the anchor clamping unit but can be used with less screws as I did to fit a door opening. Holds my weight 193 lbs with ease. Has multiple anchors to use for different heights as well. A plus.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy V

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: The box, instructions and foam on bar all had an awful funk! Reminded me of chicken manure. This is one of the problems with items made in China. you never know what the product is actually made of or what was added to it.
customer_reviews.author: Russ S.

customer_reviews.title: More than just a pull up bar.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased the Maximiza Plus to use as it was intended, as a pull up bar. However, after seeing how sturdy and well built it is I found other uses. I can hang my TRX system and heavy bag from the Maximiza Plus allowing for a complete cardio/weight resistance workout. Customer support has been incredible as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars 🌟
customer_reviews.text: I originally got the smaller shorter bar but it wasn't sturdy enough so I got this one instead. Im Lbs 230lbs and this bar holds me fine I'm extremely happy with my purchase 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Miami

customer_reviews.title: Cannot install. It arrive with one mount already fixed on the one end.
customer_reviews.text: My bar came in today but has one side with the mount fixed in the end already. I cannot mount this to the wall now. I read a previous customer review that had the same issue. The bar arrived in the packaging with one end mount already fixated on the end, making it impossible to mount to the wall. I am very upset as I cannot install this bar properly now. There is no way to remove the already fixed mount on the one end. Can Garren Fitness please respond to this and help??
customer_reviews.author: amanda l.

customer_reviews.title: Foam grip broke after a week.
customer_reviews.text: The bar is great, the weak link is the foam grip, it broke off after a week literally. Now we are trying baseball grip tape. We shall see. Regardless, 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Holds up well and was simple to install. I’m a 150 lb woman working on getting my strength back after an illness and I have found this comfortable and safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: hjm_50

customer_reviews.title: Solid, comfortable and wide span
customer_reviews.text: Good solid bar and comfortable grip. Most important it opens wider than other bars to span a space larger than a doorway.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Norman Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 35" doorway
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 35" doorway perfectly. It's very sturdy and the grips are comfy. Now get to work on those pull-ups!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Tric

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It's less destructive than the pull up bars that fit around the door frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Salisbury

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty  workout bar!
customer_reviews.text: This bar is built for heavy duty workouts. I like the additional sets of anchor plates so I can setup 3 positions for situps, squats, and pullups.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good...
customer_reviews.text: It's always the idea that folks are going to actually use the pull-up bar when they order it. When it gets here (faster than thought) and installed. THose same folks haven't used it at all but that's ok, it sounds good. I use it and it works just fine and holds me for the 3 full pull-ups I can do(at the time)
customer_reviews.author: Erik R.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this crap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bar and was excited to start getting back in shape. The first one that arrived was defective and one side would not unscrew to extend the bar to its advertised length. So I returned the first and got another. The second one that came had the SAME EXACT DEFECT as the first one. Only buy this bar if you want a broken piece of metal you can do nothing with.
customer_reviews.author: brett sheckells

customer_reviews.title: The fabric that covers the bar ripped
customer_reviews.text: We liked it but the fabric has broken already! In three days it was broken!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Kappaz

customer_reviews.title: I don't normally take the time to write reviews but......
customer_reviews.text: This bar is awesome. Easy to mount, super sturdy, and came with extra mounting hardware to mount in 3 places. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bevillenz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and value. I love that grips on the bar and how sturdy it is. It’s exactly what we were looking for. It looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: LisaGal14

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase. Installed it between two pressure-treated posts of our gazebo.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust. Comes with three sets of mounts, so it could be moved between multiple doorways. I like the cushioning, which feels like it will hold up with years of use. I've only had it for a month, so can't be certain of the durability with outdoor use. So far, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to install, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were great. Marked the holes, drilled the pilot holes, then attached the rings with screws. Pole easily installed. Great product, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: V Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Solid Quality Pull Up Bar
customer_reviews.text: Worked out perfect in my extra wide hallway. Made Solid! No regrets - I recommend this bar.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Schacherbauer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was everything as advertised. Strong and durable. used it in 42 inch doorway with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Zelfine

customer_reviews.title: Sturday
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Worth the money. Ill be returning the $15 ones I bought
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: So far so good for yoga trapeze
customer_reviews.text: Used this to hang a yoga trapeze. Seems sturdy enough to do my hanging stretches from. I do plan to minimize swinging from it, tho.
customer_reviews.author: L. W. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Use the bar every day to chin and stretch. The grips are comfortable to hold for extended workouts.
customer_reviews.author: John Bubany

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Solid pull up bar, very comfortable to grip. Easy to install if you are somewhat competent with a drill. DO NOT TRY TO INSTALL DIRECTLY ONTO DRYWALL. Keep it to the door frame unless you know how to make use of your house's structural members.
customer_reviews.author: James Thietz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bar that was wider than standard for my hallway. This was perfect. I screwed into the metal studs. I’m 200lbs and have no issues with this holding me. The grip is great. Note that this will not fit a standard door frame. It is too long for my regular doors.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Melcer

customer_reviews.title: Broke While Tightening
customer_reviews.text: While twisting the bar to elongate and fit to doorway, the central pin snapped. Now the grip spins freely around the extendable supports. No longer functional. The product worked well for about 2-weeks prior.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle McGuire

customer_reviews.title: You can bet your life on this
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bar that i can hang upsidedown from and not go crashing down. I have a 43 inch door and the frame is block other bars that i have had never gave me the confidence to put my life on the line. I used cement anchors with the mounting hardware .this was a very great find for me.i am happy
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Strong, secure, well-made.
customer_reviews.text: The GF Maximiza + Pull-up Bar is well-made and easy to install. I love the padded pole.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Holds weight beautifully with little give
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my wide door frame. Holds weight beautifully with little give. The bar itself feels nice and durable. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Roslynn

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Works great with my yoga silk set up!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Can set the bar at different heights so is flexible in use.
customer_reviews.text: Use the product for a pullup/pushup bar and like the different heights I can adjust to.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: The bar couldn’t fit between the door size I have nor could be adjusted to do so .I’m definitely alittle disappointed I was looking forward to this pull up bar during this quarantine to help keep me in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Dante Saulsberry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and move
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and we have had no problems with the sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pezzola

customer_reviews.title: Works really good.  I'm 175lbs
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit on my garage entrance door because its too long but I found a place for it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bar
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy , i found the fact that it comes with spare hardware extremely neat
customer_reviews.author: amine

customer_reviews.title: Great option for home pull ups
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I got this for my husband. This is a great way for him to do pull ups. I installed to two different heights; one for me and one for him. We are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: It's a steady bar, and everything you can expect from it
customer_reviews.text: used it for few weeks, I weight 200 lb and bar has been holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Hee seung Ro

customer_reviews.title: Too long for any of my door.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good bar but it don’t fit on any of my doors. It is too long.
customer_reviews.author: Justino

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and solid bar.
customer_reviews.text: I got my package in 2 days on standard shipping. Can’t wait to start using it every morning before work. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AnarchyRulz444

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bar is solid, secures well and doesn't shift. Grips are comfortable. Simple but elegant product. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Derek R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pull Up Bar
customer_reviews.text: Bar is very sturdy and padding is nice although we have a little rip going already.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3 girlies

customer_reviews.title: The piece is too weak.
customer_reviews.text: When I installed one of the wheels that tied the piece in the wall broke . Is very weak .
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro m.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Bar
customer_reviews.text: The bar was easy to install and easy to adjust to odd width openings. Great quality fitness bar!
customer_reviews.author: Not happy DH

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy. Installed it in my 45’ hallway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy workouts, fast and quick
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it was to install, the sturdiness. Now my workouts are complete
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Good As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Easy to install. Great for home pull ups/chin ups!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Rives

customer_reviews.title: Great pull-up bar for wide opening
customer_reviews.text: I have a 45" wide opening and this product works great.
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wide doorways
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the hype. Once I locked the bar in, it became very sturdy. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Maria M

product_meta.title: Garren Fitness Maximiza Plus Pull Up Bar – Wide Locking Doorway Pullup Bar/Chinup Bar with 3 Sets of Screw-in Door-Mounts – ONLY for Doors Wider Than 35 Inches (Adjustable Width 35 to 50 Inches)
product_meta.description:
For WIDE doorways (35 to 50 Inches Adjustable Width) - ’Pull Up to Fitness’ with the Maximiza PLUS Pull-Up Bar by Garren Fitness

The Maximiza PLUS Pull-up Bar is a perfect addition to any fitness routine for upper-body strength and toning. Its versatile uses include pull-ups, chin-ups, hanging leg raises, sit-ups and crunches. As you gain strength, it is easy to add more variations and difficulty into your Pull-up Bar exercises. With the Maximiza, you need minimal space in your house to do highly effective bodyweight exercises. The heavy-duty chrome steel bar and the multiple screw-in door mounts provide safety and stability while giving you the flexibility to move it to different places or heights. The non-slip extra-long foam grips provide a firm grip and extra comfort to minimize hand fatigue. 

The Maximiza Doorway Pull Up Bar is adjustable to fit wide doorways between 35 and 50 inches when extended. It comes with 3 sets of heavy-duty door mounts which can be screwed into up to 3 wooden doorframes in your house. Mounting Note: Always secure to the doorframe with the provided screw-in door mounts.

The maximum installation height and bodyweight supported will vary depending on the individual circumstances including required usage, mounting method and the doorframe. We always recommend using the Heavy-duty door mounts for pullups and chin-ups. Maximum weight for typical installations is 330 lbs / 150kg. 

Safety Note: Each time the bar is used, you should cautiously apply your weight to it during the first few exercises to confirm that it is secure and will safely hold your weight. 

100% Satisfaction Guarantee: If you aren’t completed satisfied, please contact us for a full refund – no questions asked.
feature_bullets: USE FOR WIDE DOORS (OVER 35 INCHES): The pull ups bar is adjustable to fit WIDE doorways between 35 and 50 inches. Also, 3 sets of screw-in door mount kits give flexibility to move to different places or heights

SCREW-IN DOOR MOUNTS for SAFETY: Heavy-duty chrome steel pull-up bar and door mounts provide great support and safety - Holds up to 330 lbs (150kg) when properly mounted using supplied screw-in door brackets. NOTE: Always use the provided screw-in door mounts and the locking screws

BUILD UPPERBODY STRENGTH: Tone and strengthen your back, arms, shoulders and abs muscles for the perfect upperbody workout. It's the perfect pullup exercise equipment for your own gym in the home, garage or the office
VERSATILE USES: Use for many exercises including pullups, chin-ups, hanging leg raises, situps and crunches (NOTE: Not to be used for other gymnastic moves or as a children's plaything)
COMFORTABLE HAND-GRIPS: Non-slip extra-long foam grips for extra comfort to minimize hand fatigue during that tough pullup workout
